attributes.action: Extend driving theory test expiry due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair to expect people to retake their theory test, which is what they will have to do seeing as driving tests have been cancelled for up to 3 months. The backlog of this will mean those who intended to book tests over summer cannot, as the calendar is full and they risk their theory test expiring.
attributes.background: People unable to book driving tests due to COVID-19 should have their theory test deadlines extended by 6 months.
